This code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0175 defines the following codes:

MLCP Medicare Limited Coverage ProcessMedicare Limited Coverage ProcessThis identifies Universal Service Identifiers that are not approved for a CPT code based on an ICD.This identifies Universal Service Identifiers that are not approved for a CPT code based on an ICD.
MACP Medicare Approved Coverage ProcessMedicare Approved Coverage ProcessThis identifies Universal Service Identifier that are approved for an ICD based on the CPT.This identifies Universal Service Identifier that are approved for an ICD based on the CPT.

name: MasterFileIdentifierCodes
title: masterFileIdentifierCodes
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts which are represented by codes identifying HL7 Versions 2.x Master Files.  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the MFI segment.
purpose: Underlying Master Code System for V2 table 0175 (Master File Identifier Code)
copyright: Copyright HL7. Licensed under creative commons public domain
